resources.string: We need storage permission to be able saving and parsing timeline data.
We need the location permission to be able showing your current location

Open following webpage: 

 https://takeout.google.com/settings/takeout/custom/location_history?pli=1 

 And request location data from your Google Account. 
 
 1. Click on *Next step* button 
 2. Choose "Send download link via email" 
 3. Frequency: "Export once" 
 4. File type: ".zip" 
 5. File size: "2 GB" 
 6. Click on *Create export* button

Check you Gmail inbox 

 You should receive an email from *Google Takeout*. 
 Please note it can take a while. A specially when you requesting it for the first time. 
 
 When you receive the email. Open it and press on *Download your files* button.
 
 After ZIP file is downloaded proceed to the next step.

You are almost done 

 On the next screen use *Upload* button and select previously downloaded ZIP file. 

 Please note it can take 2-5 minutes to get all the countries you have visited in past. 

 Lets do it!
Upload ZIP file and we will start getting your locations soon.
